headline: POTTERY BARN LAUNCHES IN UNITED KINGDOM
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 23, 2025--Pottery Barn, a portfolio brand of Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE: WSM), the world’s largest digital-first, design-led and sustainable home retailer, announced today the launch of a new website for customers in the United Kingdom. For the first time, UK customers will have direct access to Pottery Barn’s signature collections of furniture, bedding, décor, and accessories—all crafted with an emphasis on quality, timeless style, and sustainability.
